subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Dirk Nowitzki’s relentlessness has propelled the Dallas Mavericks to three double-digit winning streaks, the best record in the league and Nowitzki to his most dominating season.
snippet: Dirk Nowitzki’s relentlessness has propelled the Dallas Mavericks to three double-digit winning streaks, the best record in the league and Nowitzki to his most dominating season.
